issue.title: [MATLAB] Enable GitHub Actions CI for MATLAB Interface on Windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15196](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15196). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Enable CI and Testing for MATLAB submissions to the [Apache Arrow project](https://github.com/apache/arrow) on GitHub. This task can be worked on after [MATLAB Actions](https://github.com/matlab-actions/setup-matlab) is enabled on Windows.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15196?focusedCommentId=17603669) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned per [project policy](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/developers/bug_reports.html#issue-assignment). Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
